A version of '''[[Minecraft Infdev]]''' was released on '''June 16, 2010''', at 18:08 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:705153260|Caves, prettier water.]] – The Word of Notch, June 16, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Spring]]s'''
* Now generate naturally.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''Liquids'''
* Flowing liquids now take on the appearance of smooth slopes with a flowing texture on top.
* Still liquids now have a vertex offset applied, meaning that the corners of some liquid blocks can reach up to a full block in height.
* Buckets can now pick up full liquids which are behind a flowing liquid block. 

'''[[File:Lava JE11.png|32px]] [[Lava]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Lava JE10.png|32px]].
* Now generates naturally in caves, replacing all air below Y=12.
* Lava now only spreads 4 blocks instead of 8.

'''[[File:Water JE9.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Water JE8.png|32px]].
* Downward flowing water now pushes the player out.

'''[[File:Bedrock JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bedrock]]'''
* Now generates at the bottom 5 layers of the world (Besides the bottom-most, where the infinite lava sea still generates). 

'''{{Animate|Rose JE2.png; Dandelion JE2.png|32px}} [[Flower]]s '''
* Now they are generated again.

'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE2.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* Setting the [[Options#Video Settings|graphics mode]] to Fast makes leaves appear and behave as opaque solid blocks [[File:Oak Leaves (fast) JE1.png|32px]].
* With fast graphics, blocks such as [[Torch]]es, [[Door]]s and [[Lever]]s can be placed on leaves and mobs can spawn on top of leaves.

'''{{Animate|Red Mushroom JE2.png; Brown Mushroom JE2.png|32px}} [[Mushroom]]s'''
* Now they are generated again.

=== World generation ===
'''General'''
* Coastlines are now more gradual, making oceans generally smaller.
* Trees no longer have logs inside of leaves.

'''[[Cave]]s'''
* Re-implemented caves.
* Regional caves. 
** Some areas have more caves than others now.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* The sides of the blocks no longer have a flowing water texture when viewed underwater.
